author: Special Correspondent
text:
Pongal festival was celebrated in various schools and colleges in the district on Wednesday.

At St. Xavier’s College in Palayamkottai, students performed traditional dances and martial arts such as ‘silambam.’ Sankar Ram of Government Higher Secondary School, Sankarankoil, gave a special lecture on ‘Pongal’ and traditions of Tamils. Rev. At Einstein College of Engineering, the students prepared sweet pongal and organised cultural events. Students of Aditya Vidhya Niketan celebrated Pongal on the school premises.

Pongal celebration organised by a few departments of Manonmaniam Sundaranar University turned bitter following a verbal duel between two groups of students.

As one of the students parked his car at the function venue, another group of students asked him to park it in some other place. It triggered a heated argument between two groups of students and one of them was allegedly assaulted by some students. Somebody called the ‘108’ ambulance service to take the injured student to hospital even as somebody else alerted the Pettai police station. The police picked up a few students for enquiry.
title: Pongal celebrated
